Module it.polimi.ingsw.GC24

Package view

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    View
    A view is any views that observe the game and send commands to the controller.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AssetLoader
    This class contains all the method required to handle the text Information about the Gods in the configuration file
    ClientErrorMessages
    This class contains a set of messages that are used to signal specific errors during the game
    GodAssetsBundle
    This class contains the methods used to handle the files of the gods
    RemoteView
    This class represents the abstraction of the Client, observed from the point of view of the Server It is the communication Link between the Client and the Server
    ViewManager
    Handles the view screens, and calls server adapters methods in order to communicate with the server
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ActivityNotAllowedException
    This class defines a particular Exception, called when the Player calls a method when it is not supposed to be its turn
    IllegalActionException
    This class defines a particular exception, called when the action cannot be executed (usually because the parameters are invalid)
    IllegalValueException
    IllegalValueException is a checked exception thrown when an user input is not valid
    ProtocolViolationException
    This class defines a particular exception, called when there is something wrong with the flow of the State Machine
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    ServerListener
    This Tag defines whatever is considered a listener
